title: Skate - no straight lines
content:
Looking for the font used in the Skate video game. It's very nontraditional with no really straight lines.

[http://ui12.gamespot.com/1323/222-9855\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824091429/http:/ui12.gamespot.com/1323/222-9855_2.jpg "http://ui12.gamespot.com/1323/222-9855\_2.jpg")
author: joejohnson9182

comments.content: My bet is that it's a custom logo, not a font.
It's not [Plakatbau](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824091429/http:/www.typedifferent.com/1995/index.html), but it's quite reminiscent, if you're just after the same look and feel.
